name: 【SCP】器関ノ彷徨 -The will of a single Tale-【DEMOver.】
name_original: 【SCP】器関ノ彷徨 -The will of a single Tale-【DEMOver.】
description:
-"Do you believe the actuality now?"

In 20██ year, breached containment of a certain object occurs in the Foundation / JP branch.
The JP branch, which has caused serious damage but allowed the escape of the object, consulted the headquarters of the United States on the issuance of {Protocol 271}.

{Protocol 271} ...... {Project MA-13}

And the plan will start.
In the plan - a blind girl named "Ryouzen Kanata" was deeply involved.



[Description]
"器関ノ彷徨 -The will of a single Tale-" is a story told in the world view of the SCP Foundation.
This work is a secondary creation work of "SCP Foundation" and follows CC BY-SA 3.0

Mostly "MMD" is used for characters and backgrounds.


The cumulative DL number at Steam has reached 10,000DL.
The production of "main part" begins.

Thank you very much for everyone who supported us.


※Genre is visual novel.
　Videos are posted on YouTube as soon as the game is released.


P.S.
It is currently being translated into English sentences.
Completion is undecided.
It is also considering correspondence to Chinese.
